    • Method Detail

      • getCurationsFeedItems

        public void getCurationsFeedItems(CurationsFeedRequest request,
                         java.lang.String widgetId,
                         CurationsFeedCallback cb)
        Get curations feed using specified parameters
        Parameters:
        request - The request is used to specify parameters which will be used in the Curations GET request
        widgetId - When presenting more than one BVCurationsCollectionView in a ViewController, provide unique names each each configuration type. This is used for analytics reporting to calculate performance among different BVCurationsCollectionView configurations. If only providing one collection view, just set to nil.
        cb - Callback is used to handle successful and unsuccessful requests Note: This method keeps a weak reference to the CurationsFeedRequest instance and will be garbage collected if you do not keep a strong reference to it. }.
